issues.title: Timestamp and validity should also be added to "Location"  from  Adrian during WG adoption
issues.author: lana-wu
issues.body:
I’m interested to see that the timestamp and validity are present under the geolocation part of the tree (good), except…
**Why don’t they apply to more of the parts of the tree?** 

Actually, I wasn’t thinking about mobility (although there are fields in which inventory is mobile – military, emergency services, ad hoc, satellite).
I was thinking about validity:
-	This data was set up in 1856, the name of the country may have changed since then.
-	This data depends on a satellite GPS system that may have become detuned since then.
-	This data was set up when the company was independent before I was acquired by MegaCorp.

A

[https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/msg/inventory-yang/IRs24T4q0eCjGo5fK8v1OPepF0E/](url)
